title: Announcer Packs
body: I realize that being able to ad your own announcer pack is a thing but I've recently wanted to try it and well, it seems that they way to do it has changed. Can anyone help?

replies.body: As far as I'm aware, the announcer VOs are currently only tied to certain events (such as the Butcher's Bridge event from earlier this year), and are not "readily available" to be changed at any time. I believe Riot has stated they're looking at adding optional announcer VOs to the store in the future, but have no information on when that might happen.
